text:
[Verse]
Woke up this morning
Sky so blue yeah
Feel the sunlight
Shine on through

[Verse 2]
Put on my sneakers
Sing a tune yeah
Step outside now
Feeling new

[Chorus]
A day in the sun
We’ll have some fun
Laughter in the air
Everywhere

[Verse 3]
Birds are singing
Flowers bloom yeah
Heart is racing
Don’t need gloom

[Verse 4]
Friends are calling
Join the crew yeah
Dancing freely
Just us two

[Chorus]
A day in the sun
We’ll have some fun
Laughter in the air
Everywhere
title: A Day in the Sun
